import React from 'react' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import '../static/css/nav.css' // import '../static/js/nav.js' import '../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js' // import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' // import NavDropdown from 'react-bootstrap/NavDropdown' //import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' const Navbar = () =>{ const nav = (e) =>{ const line = document.querySelector('#line') line.style.left = e.offsetLeft + 'px' line.style.width = e.offsetWidth + 'px' } return (
